name: Twin Fall (Demo)
description:
Click to change fall direction (or tap if on mobile) and don't run into the buildings

The tops of the buildings are safe, just don't crash into them :)

You will notice that this game is currently devoid of art or sound. My focus is the game play currently, my second build will include both sound and art as well as a main menu screen.

Please let me know what you think and be brutally honest in your reviews.

Thanks for playing!

Version 1.1

Fixed speed bug

Added Some Art

Added Coin and Pick-Up sound effect

Added High Score Tracking
